text: (manitarkale! Cantekattirkitamillata) telivana attatcikal unkalitam vanta pinnarum ninkal (islamil urutiyaka illamal) naluvi vituvirkalanal (unkalait tantippatil) niccayamaka allah mikaittavanum (unkalai evvitam natatta ventum enpatai nankarinta) nunnarivutaiyavanum avan enpatai ninkal urutiyaka arintu kollunkal
